name: Amazon Web Services
description: Set up your web application on an AWS instance.

name: Amazon Echo
description: Set up a complete Alexa skill that can run on Amazon Echo.

name: Barcode Scanner
description: Ability to read, scan and display results with a barcode scanning feature.

name: Google Adsense
description: Integrate Google Adsense account so that your application can show advertisements.

name: Google Assistant
description: Bring hotword detection, voice control, natural language understanding, Google's smarts, and more to your projects.

name: QR Codes
description: Ability to read, scan QR codes and display results.

name: Mailchimp
description: Integrate MailChimp into your application so that you can send beautiful newsletters or announcements.

name: Intercom
description: Integrate Intercom for real-time customer support.

name: RFID
description: Ability to automatically identify and track tags attached to objects.

name: Wearables
description: Provide support for wearable devices in your application.
